Kansas_City.Roman Catholic Diocese of Kansas City\u2: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Kansas City–Saint Joseph (Latin: Dioecesis Kansanopolitanae–Sancti Josephi) is an ecclesiastical territory or diocese of the Roman Catholic Church in the state of Missouri in the United States. The current bishop is James Vann Johnson, Jr.. It is a suffragan see of the Archdiocese of Saint Louis.
